Plot: Guy Maddin reluctantly returns to his childhood home, an abandoned Canadian island, where his parents ran an orphanage. As Guy fulfills his dying mother's request to paint the lighthouse ...
Title: Brand Upon the Brain! A Remembrance in 12 Chapters
Writer: Guy Maddin, Louis Negin (narration), George Toles
Actors: Gretchen Krich, Sullivan Brown, Maya Lawson, Katherine E. Scharhon
tomatoConsensus: A bizarre, compelling spectacle that invests its absurd plot with heartfelt sincerety, Brand Upon the Brain! is a unique cinematic experience.
